Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2017 07:41AM CME3 wrote: Thanks so much for creating this post. I'm having a mastectomy on March 1st and go back and forth from feeling okay to overwhelmed with emotion. This is my first post and also looking for support. I found out about the diagnosis about a month ago and have not had other treatment. Just gearing up for getting all loose ends tied up before being out of work, etc. I have three kids and getting them all situated to be overnight elsewhere the night before the surgery. Finally settled that last night and feel a bit of weight lifted.
Posts.Title: March 2017 Surgery plantchild Molly50
